flash.login_link_sent.error: An error occured while sending the login link. Please retry.

flash.require_login: You have to login in order to access this page.
flash.revert_to_previous_version.success: The page has been reverted to the selected version.
flash.scheduler.force_run.error: An error occurred while forcing the recurring message to run.
flash.scheduler.force_run.success: The recurring message has been forced to run.
forgot_password.help: Enter your email address to receive a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.link_sent_validity: If you have an account a link to reset your password has been sent to your email address. This link is valid for 5 minutes.

installation.error: An error occurred. Please verify the configuration and retry.

register.title: Join us!

reset_password.email.text: Following your reset password request, here is the link to choose your new password for your account with the e-mail address %email%.
